typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Employees
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		Depname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Departments
Employees, Departments lookup(department == deptid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 sink(input(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['lookupactivity11.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ouputdataset
